answerText: mucus [10] Mucus is secreted by these cells of the mucous membranes, which are named for their unusual shape. They have basally positioned nuclei and are full of vesicles containing mucins.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2015 | Illinois A + Ottawa A  | 17 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Cystic fibrosis leads to abnormally heavy accumulation of this substance in the airways. For 10 points each: [10] Name this substance secreted in the nose and throat. Its subtypes include phlegm.
